definition: ambitious despite a lack of talent (idiom)

sentences.english: Some other drugs have to be taken on an empty stomach.
sentences.chinese: 而其他某些藥物，必須在空腹服用。

sentences.english: Putting food into an empty stomach helps synchronize the body clock.
sentences.chinese: 空腹喫食物幫助人體時鐘準時。

sentences.english: And never take your vitamins on an empty stomach.
sentences.chinese: 也不要空腹喫維生素，這會讓胃不適。

sentences.english: Tryptophan works when your stomach is empty, not when your stomach is very full.
sentences.chinese: 色氨酸在你空腹，而非飽腹的時候工作。

sentences.english: Penances , fasting, virginity, martyrdom, and other good deeds please him and receive his reward.
sentences.chinese: 空腹，貞操，烈士和其他好事請他和接受他的獎勵。

sentences.english: Conclusions There is weak negative correlation between fasting plasma PYY and BMI.
sentences.chinese: 結論空腹血PYY水平與BMI呈弱的負相關。

sentences.english: How many eggs can a man eat on an empty stomach ?
sentences.chinese: 一個人空腹能喫多少個雞蛋？

sentences.english: Good, OK and attenuant ropy blood, very helpful to health.
sentences.chinese: 早上空腹喝淡鹽水到底好不好？

sentences.english: Objective The aim of this study was to describe the interdigestive gastroduodenal motility in patients with decompensated cirrhosis.
sentences.chinese: 目的研究肝硬化失代償期患者空腹胃腸動力有無異常。

sentences.english: But drinking on an empty stomach isn't smart either.
sentences.chinese: 但是，空腹飲酒也非明智之選。

sentences.english: The increases of fasting and postprandial blood glucose are directly related with age.
sentences.chinese: 老年人空腹及餐後血糖升高與年齡有直接關係。

sentences.english: It is best absorbed with carbohydrates, or on an empty stomach.
sentences.chinese: 它在空腹時，或和碳水化合物一起時吸收最好。

sentences.english: Where is I dwell place can peaceful my heart lung , empty stomach in full hate .
sentences.chinese: 何處是吾棲身處可安吾心腑，滿腔空腹怨。

sentences.english: Daily early take feed on an empty stomach.
Don't eat fasting tomatoes, best after dinner.
sentences.chinese: 空腹時不要喫蕃茄，最好飯後喫。

sentences.english: The polymorphism in leptin gene is associated with fasting leptin in non-diabetic non-hypertensive people.
sentences.chinese: 瘦素基因該多態性與個體空腹血漿瘦素水平相關。

definition: to fast/to abstain from eating/to forbid the eating of (certain foods)/a fast
